text.name: sys_description
text.text: This collection includes all the 2 player games in your library, all systems combined and listed in alphabetical order. It's perfect for when you and a friend want to get some co-operative or competitive retro-gaming on. This includes all the action, racing, platforming, beat'em up, fighting, etc. games that featured a multiplayer mode. Street Fighter 2, Goof Troop, Gunstar Heroes, Pipe Plumber, World of Illusion, Captain Commando, Tetris Battle Gaiden, Magical Adventure, etc. come to mind. All the usual sorting filters are available.
